abstract: Dow Jones industrial average rises 180.05 points, or 1.58 percent, to 11,577.05; Standard & Poor's 500-stock index climbs 24.52 points, more than 2 percent, to 1,225.38; Nasdaq composite index advances 1.6 percent to 2,657.43.
snippet: Investors are studying corporate profits for direction, not only at the big banks.
lead_paragraph: Investors are studying corporate profits for direction, not only at the big banks.

headline.main: Bank Shares Lift Wall Street in a Turnaround
headline.print_headline: Bank Shares Lift Wall Street in a Turnaround
